headline.main: A ‘Super Pac’ Targets Hillary Clinton’s Wealthy Connections

docs.snippet: Called “Dead Broke,” an ad focuses on how Mrs. Clinton and her husband made money for themselves and their foundation after Bill Clinton’s presidency....
docs.abstract: Ad of the Week column; spot funded by super PAC supporting Donald J Trump attempts to portray Hillary Clinton as financially opportunistic.
docs.lead_paragraph: Called “Dead Broke,” an ad focuses on how Mrs. Clinton and her husband made money for themselves and their foundation after Bill Clinton’s presidency.

headline.main: Olympic Security Asks Female Iranian Fan to Drop Sign
headline.print_headline: Olympic Security Asks Female Iranian Fan to Drop Sign

docs.snippet: Olympic security personnel questioned a female Iranian volleyball fan Saturday when she showed up for a match holding a large sign that read "Let Iranian Women Enter Their Stadiums" and wearing a white T-shirt with those same words....
docs.lead_paragraph: Olympic security personnel questioned a female Iranian volleyball fan Saturday when she showed up for a match holding a large sign that read "Let Iranian Women Enter Their Stadiums" and wearing a white T-shirt with those same words.

headline.main: A Congressman Slighted Immigrants, Then Embraced Them. Now He Runs From Trump.
headline.print_headline: Seen as Vulnerable, a Transformed G.O.P. Incumbent Runs From Trump

docs.snippet: Representative Mike Coffman of Colorado, seen as one of the most vulnerable Republican incumbents this year, started learning Spanish after redistricting changed the demographics of his voting pool....
docs.abstract: Republican Rep Mike Coffman faces difficult re-election race in Colorado, where 2013 redistricting has given him new, largely Hispanic constituency; is reaching out to immigrant communities and has explicitly distanced himself from his party's presidential nominee Donald Trump.
docs.lead_paragraph: Representative Mike Coffman of Colorado, seen as one of the most vulnerable Republican incumbents this year, started learning Spanish after redistricting changed the demographics of his voting pool.

headline.main: Reitz's Gold in Rapid Fire Pistol Gives Germany 3 in 3 Days
headline.print_headline: Reitz's Gold in Rapid Fire Pistol Gives Germany 3 in 3 Days

docs.snippet: Christian Reitz was thrilled to watch his teammates win Olympic gold the previous two days, hoping he could keep Germany's shooting string going....
docs.lead_paragraph: Christian Reitz was thrilled to watch his teammates win Olympic gold the previous two days, hoping he could keep Germany's shooting string going.

headline.main: U.S.-Backed Forces Wrest Control of Syria's Manbij From Islamic State
headline.print_headline: U.S.-Backed Forces Wrest Control of Syria's Manbij From Islamic State

docs.snippet: U.S.-backed forces have seized full control of the northern Syrian city of Manbij near the Turkish border after the last remaining Islamic State fighters, who had been using civilians as human shields, left, a spokesman for the group said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S.-backed forces have seized full control of the northern Syrian city of Manbij near the Turkish border after the last remaining Islamic State fighters, who had been using civilians as human shields, left, a spokesman for the group said Friday.

headline.main: Despite a 1-Shoe Finish, Ethiopian Steeplechaser Into Final
headline.print_headline: Despite a 1-Shoe Finish, Ethiopian Steeplechaser Into Final

docs.snippet: With one shoe on and one shoe off, Etenesh Diro raised a big cheer at the Olympics on Saturday with a gutsy finish in her 3,000-meters steeplechase heat....
docs.lead_paragraph: With one shoe on and one shoe off, Etenesh Diro raised a big cheer at the Olympics on Saturday with a gutsy finish in her 3,000-meters steeplechase heat.

headline.main: Shooting: Germany Makes It a Hat-Trick With Shooting Gold
headline.print_headline: Shooting: Germany Makes It a Hat-Trick With Shooting Gold

docs.snippet: Germany clinched its third Olympic shooting title in as many days on Saturday as police officer Christian Reitz won the gold medal in the 25 meter rapid fire pistol event....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany clinched its third Olympic shooting title in as many days on Saturday as police officer Christian Reitz won the gold medal in the 25 meter rapid fire pistol event.

headline.main: U.S. Drone Kills Islamic State Leader for Afghanistan, Pakistan: Officials
headline.print_headline: U.S. Drone Kills Islamic State Leader for Afghanistan, Pakistan: Officials

docs.snippet: The leader of Islamic State's branch in Afghanistan and Pakistan was killed in a U.S. drone strike on July 26, a Pentagon spokesman said on Friday after the Afghan ambassador to Pakistan announced the news to Reuters....
docs.lead_paragraph: The leader of Islamic State's branch in Afghanistan and Pakistan was killed in a U.S. drone strike on July 26, a Pentagon spokesman said on Friday after the Afghan ambassador to Pakistan announced the news to Reuters.

headline.main: Athletics-Harting Keeps Discus Gold in the Family With Final Throw
headline.print_headline: Athletics-Harting Keeps Discus Gold in the Family With Final Throw

docs.snippet: German Christoph Harting dramatically snatched Olympic discus gold from Poland's Piotr Malachowski with his last throw if the final on Saturday as he registered a personal best of 68.37 metres to keep the title in the family....
docs.lead_paragraph: German Christoph Harting dramatically snatched Olympic discus gold from Poland's Piotr Malachowski with his last throw if the final on Saturday as he registered a personal best of 68.37 metres to keep the title in the family.
